message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. I believe it will greatly benefit your business operations. For this exceptional opportunity, I am offering the product at $14,000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you considering my needs.  However, $14,000 is still a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product.  This price is fair and allows us both to make a good deal.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering our product's value and your interest, I propose we finalize the deal at $13,000.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $13,000 is still a bit high for me, but I'm willing to go up to $12,500.  This price is a fair compromise that allows both of us to make a deal.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your flexibility. In order to reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I propose we settle on $12,750 for the product.
